Body:
stats = {'All': {'gene': 1, 'other': 0, 'bsbe': 0, 'asbe': 0, 'asae': 0,
    'bsae': 0}, 'aaa': {'gene': 1, 'other': 0, 'bsbe': 0, 'asbe': 0, 'asae':
    0, 'bsae': 0}}
out_t = StringIO()
out_g = StringIO()
trans = copy.deepcopy(self.example.tas)
gffs = copy.deepcopy(self.example.gffs)
stc.detect_tag_region(gffs, trans, stats, out_t, out_g, 'gene', None)
self.assertDictEqual(stats, {'All': {'asbe': 1, 'asae': 0, 'other': 0,
    'bsbe': 0, 'gene': 1, 'bsae': 0}, 'aaa': {'asbe': 1, 'asae': 0, 'other':
    0, 'bsbe': 0, 'gene': 1, 'bsae': 0}})
